about_the_game:
Lewd Battle Tower Defense Game.
- Play against 3 different AI opponents
- 12 different levels.
- Unlock 12 GC Art drawings in the gallery.
- 6 different towers
- 6 different units

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity, Oral sex, Penetration, and fluids.

detailed_description:
Lewd Battle Tower Defense Game.
- Play against 3 different AI opponents
- 12 different levels.
- Unlock 12 GC Art drawings in the gallery.
- 6 different towers
- 6 different units

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Graphics: gtx 1050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Graphics: gtx 1060

short_description: Play against 3 different AI opponents across 12 different levels, and earn 12 amazing Gallery images!
